# CameraZoomRange

**Class**

A minimum and maximum camera distance, in meters, from the center of the map.

## Declaration

```swift
class CameraZoomRange
```

## Defining a zoom range

- **new CameraZoomRange()**: Constructs an instance of a camera zoom range object with no minimum or maximum camera distance.
- **new CameraZoomRange(rangeParams)**: Creates an instance of a camera zoom range object with an object literal.
- **new CameraZoomRange(min, max)**: Creates an instance of a camera zoom range object with the specified numeric arguments that specify minimum and maximum camera distances.
- **CameraZoomRangeConstructorOptions**: Initialization options for the camera zoom range.

## Setting minimum and maximum distances

- **minCameraDistance**: The minimum allowed distance of the camera from the center of the map in meters.
- **maxCameraDistance**: The maximum allowed distance of the camera from the center of the map in meters.

## Instance Methods

- **copy()**: Returns a copy of the camera zoom region.

## Map units

- **MapPoint**: A location, in map units, of a point on the Earth’s surface projected onto a 2D map.
- **MapRect**: A rectangular region, in map units, of a two-dimensional map projection.
- **MapSize**: A pair of values, in map units, that define the width and height of a rectangular area of a map projection.
